name: Gotouchi Hello Kitty Sugoroku Monogatari
overview: In Gotouchi Hello Kitty Sugoroku Monogatari the Hello Kitty with global appeal re-enters the gaming realm in a board game peppered with quiz challenges, mini-games and other interactions. Up to 4 players may engage by adopting various Kitty characters. The game features 2d cute cartoon graphics & is up for 4 human players or play againts 1 or 3 computer players.
